articles.description: 吴说获悉，TUSD 宣布聘请注册会计师公司 The Network Firm 提供实时鉴证服务。早先据 Coindesk 报道，负责审计 FTX 的公司 Armanino 的员工为加密行业的初创企业成立了自己的会计公司 The Network Firm 。在 BUSD 退出后，TUSD 正在币安承担更重要的角色。https://trueusd.medium.com/tusd-engages-with-the-network-firm-for-real-time-attestation-services-52024b78dece

articles.description:
吴说获悉，Lido 开发商 MixBytes 发文表示， Lido (LDO) 将于 8 月 1 日停止其在 Polkadot (DOT) 和 Kusama (KSM) 上的质押计划，原因为采用率和增长没有达到维持投资的预期要求。目前 Lido 上总共有价值 400 万美元的 DOT 和价值 7.5 万美元的 KSM。
https://mixbytes.io/blog/mixbytes-sunsets-lido-on-polkadot-and-kusama#rec563434649

articles.description: 作为去年倒闭的加密对冲基金清算程序的一部分，三箭资本两位创始人被勒令于 5 月 22 日在英属维尔京群岛出庭。如果未能回复命令，他们将被判藐视法庭。Kyle Davies 和 Su Zhu 必须在 4 月 14 日之前向清算人提供与公司破产相关的所有文件。（CoinDesk）https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/03/29/british-virgin-islands-court-orders-3ac-founders-to-attend-examination-on-dec-19/?utm_medium=social&utm_source=onecryptofeed&utm_campaign=headlines

mhonkasalo.lens: L2s are an ATH of 6.81% of Ethereum's entire gas spend this month. https://t.co/YWHIQBpwDH
articles.title: Re https://twitter.com/mhonkasalo/status/1640749816572518401?s=20

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: 吴说获悉，据 @mhonkasalo 分享的数据，本月 L2 Gas 支出占 Ethereum 的 6.81%，创下月度新高，这可能主要是与 Arbitrum 空投领取，以及 Arbitrum 空投热带动其他有潜在空投激励的 L2 的交互活动激增等有关。有观点认为，待 EIP-4844 实施，L2 费用将大幅降低至可忽略不计，这一现象将不复存在。

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
Re 吴说获悉，据 @0xcryptowizard，Blur 推迟减半收益招致社区批评。对于大额成交者（刷空投）而言，此前所获取积分被稀释，利益受损；NFT 玩家指责 Blur 机制让 NFT 从收藏变成了交易和刷空投的游戏，且被巨鲸控制了 NFT 市场价格，floor price 下跌（波动剧烈）。 @0xcryptowizard 认为，长期来看 Blur… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1640982894146629633

🔮0xWizard: Blur 没有如预期减半收益，推迟了1个月。评论里全部是骂声，fuck blur 成为 NFT 领域的政治正确了，这里说一些我的思考。
矿工：
理解 @machibigbrother 为代表的大矿工（刷空投）为什么不满，前面刷空投的优势，被延长一个月的双倍奖励稀释了，利益受损，这像项目方在 gaming 矿工，观感不好。
1/6

As you may be aware, on Tuesday 28 March, SafeMoon’s Liquidity Pool was compromised. We have taken swift action to resolve the situation and protect our community. articles.author: 8848 社区（8848 Community）
articles.description:
interesting

Forgiven: Arbitrum 空投之夜停机之谜
日前主任怒锤一波以太神教只搞迷信,不重视技术,激发了大量声讨,调查结果：
1. 负载最重时,出快正常,但排序器出现问题,性能严重下降,官方RPC和Airdop前端宕机,区块浏览器20mins未更新数据
2. 排序器每秒700万Gas是软限制,之后Gas Price会飙升限流,真实环境极限120～150TPS
articles.title: interesting

MetaMask 🦊💙: 🚨There are quite a few false rumors going around about a MetaMask snapshot/airdrop/etc. on March 31.
These rumors are not only false, but they are dangerous. They create opportunities for scammers and phishers.
Please be on the lookout for fake sites in the coming days🙏

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
Here’s what’s wrong with Capo;
- As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. 
- Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? 
If you don’t define your invalidation, you’re never wrong. 
Do you want to be right or make money? Can’t do both…

il Capo Of Crypto: Despite all the noise, I know that the vast majority of those who follow me are genuine and good people. And these deserve an update:
This time away from Twitter has been very good and necessary. I'm totally fine, enjoying my personal life. Thank you to everyone who has shown… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1637374540933103617
articles.title: Here’s what’s wrong with Capo; - As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. - Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? If ...

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral.
Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m.

Balaji: I will take that bet.
You buy 1 BTC.
I will send $1M USD.
This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k.
The term is 90 days.
All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation.
If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe

articles.author: DeFi Surfer
articles.description:
Debt ceiling crisis incooooming https://twitter.com/tavicosta/status/1640777830106648576

Otavio (Tavi) Costa: The latest government report is out, and the US Treasury cash balance just reached another recent low. 
Only $187 billion left. 
Keep in mind that February's deficit alone cost $262 billion. https://t.co/2rYBzU7pO3
